naslov: PRODAJA: Lopar, Kuća sa 7 apartmana, 640m2 +1800m2 dvorište (prodaja)
opis: PRODAJA: Lopar, Kuća sa 7 apartmana, 640m2 +1800m2 dvorište Prodaje se atraktivna kuća na izvrsnoj lokaciji, u neposrednoj blizini mora. Kuća je podijeljena na 7 apartmana: 3 apartmana u prizemlju, 3 apartmana na 1. katu i penthouse s galerijom na 2. katu. Kući pripada 8 natkrivenih parkirnih mjesta. U dvorištu površine 1875m2 nalazi se sjenica za roštilj te dječje igralište. Postoji i idealni projekt bazena u dvorištu. Svi apartmani su namješteni klima uređajima i televizijom. Apartman A u prizemlju sastoji se od spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, kupaonice i 2 balkona. Površina 40m2, idealan za turistički smještaj 2+1 osobe. Apartman B u prizemlju sastoji se od 2 spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, kupaonice i 2 balkona. Površina 60m2, idealan za turistički smještaj 4+2 osobe. Apartman C na 1. katu sastoji se od spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, kupaonice i 2 balkona. Površina 40m2, idealan za turistički smještaj 2+1 osobe. Apartman D na 1. katu sastoji se od 2 spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, kupaonice i 2 balkona. Površina 60m2, idealan za turistički smještaj 4+2 osobe. Apartman E u prizemlju sastoji se od 2 spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, kupaonice i 2 balkona. Površina 55m2, idealan za turistički smještaj 4+1 osobe. Apartman F na 1. katu sastoji se od 2 spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, kupaonice i 2 balkona. Površina 55m2, idealan za turistički smještaj 4+1 osobe. Na 2. katu nalazi se dvoetažni penthouse s galerijom ukupne površine 250m2. Prva etaža sastoji se od prostranog dnevnog boravka, blagovaone i kuhinje, 2 spavaće sobe, kupaonice, hodnika i prostrane terase. Na drugoj etaži nalaze se 2 spavaće sobe, kupaonica s WC-om i WC. Ima izlaz na balkon s pogledom na more. Kuća je pozicionirana na izvrsnoj lokaciji, samo 200m od mora i plaže. Trgovina, restorani i centar Lopra nalaze se unutar 100m od kuće. Nekretnina je odlična prilika za investiciju kroz najam. Vlasništvo je uredno. Agencijska naknada za kupca iznosi 2% +PDV. Za više informacija i dogovor o razgledavanju, kontaktirajte +385 99 4888 003. FOR SALE: Lopar, House with 7 Apartments, 640m² + 1800m² Yard An attractive house is up for sale in an excellent location, just a short distance from the sea. The house is divided into 7 apartments: 3 apartments on the ground floor, 3 apartments on the first floor, and a penthouse with a gallery on the second floor. The property includes 8 covered parking spaces. The spacious 1875m² yard features a barbecue gazebo and a children's playground. There is also an ideal project for a swimming pool in the yard. All apartments are equipped with air conditioning and TV. Apartment Layout: Apartment A (Ground Floor): 1 bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom, and 2 balconies. Size: 40m², ideal for tourist accommodation for 2+1 persons. Apartment B (Ground Floor): 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom, and 2 balconies. Size: 60m², ideal for tourist accommodation for 4+2 persons. Apartment C (1st Floor): 1 bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom, and 2 balconies. Size: 40m², ideal for tourist accommodation for 2+1 persons. Apartment D (1st Floor): 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom, and 2 balconies. Size: 60m², ideal for tourist accommodation for 4+2 persons. Apartment E (Ground Floor): 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom, and 2 balconies. Size: 55m², ideal for tourist accommodation for 4+1 persons. Apartment F (1st Floor): 2 bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom, and 2 balconies. Size: 55m², ideal for tourist accommodation for 4+1 persons. Penthouse (2nd Floor): A two-story penthouse with a gallery, total size of 250m². The first level includes a spacious living room, dining area, kitchen, 2 bedrooms, bathroom, hallway, and a large terrace. The second level features 2 bedrooms, a bathroom with a toilet, and an additional toilet. It also has access to a balcony with a sea view. The house is situated in a prime location, just 200m from the sea and the beach. Shops, restaurants, and the center of Lopar are within 100m of the house. This property is a great investment opportunity for rental purposes. Ownership is clean and documented. Agency fee for the buyer is 2% + VAT. For more information and to schedule a viewing, contact +385 99 4888 003. ID KOD AGENCIJE: 12024 PEX Avantgarde d.o.o. Mob: 0994888003 E-mail: info@pex-nekretnine.hr www.pex.hr
